leave_lever.description: Do not rotate the lever as it is not working.

wipe_lever.description: Wipe the lever to clean it.

rotate_lever.description: Rotate the lever to initiate the flushing mechanism.

clean_lever.description: Clean the lever to maintain hygiene.

clean_toilet.description: Clean the toilet body to maintain cleanliness.

leave_toilet.description: Do not clean the toilet. It is already clean.

clean_toilet_body.description: Clean the toilet body to maintain hygiene.

press_lever.description: The lever is not working. Thus, keep it as it is.

clean_all.description: Clean the entire toilet including the lever and the body.

leave_all.description: Do not clean the toilet or the lever.

clean_whole_toilet.description: Clean the entire toilet including the body and lever.
